diwali.name: Aurora Bloom
diwali.description: A luminous collectible bear, crafted to embody the sparkle of Diwali nights. Each detail reflects festive elegance, making it a centerpiece for collectors.

diwali.name: Twilight Ember
diwali.description: A doll inspired by the soft glow of evening lights. With graceful finishes and timeless charm, it captures the warmth of celebration.

diwali.name: Celestia Glow
diwali.description: A radiant teddy that symbolizes joy and prosperity. Designed as a rare keepsake, it blends modern luxury with festive spirit.

diwali.name: Eterna Flame
diwali.description: A doll that echoes the eternal light of Diwali. Limited to just 250 pieces, it’s a festival treasure for true connoisseurs.

christmas.name: Snowlume
christmas.description: A snowy-white teddy with shimmering silver accents, symbolizing winter purity and festive charm. An ultra-rare holiday keepsake for collectors worldwide.

christmas.name: Crimson Frost
christmas.description: A deep crimson doll with frosted detailing, embodying warmth in the cold season. A timeless collectible that radiates festive elegance.

christmas.name: Everglow
christmas.description: A premium teddy inspired by evergreen pines and golden lights. Designed to capture the cozy, magical essence of Christmas nights.

christmas.name: Starlace
christmas.description: A doll adorned with star-inspired patterns, representing holiday wonder and celestial beauty. Each piece is delicately finished for a truly premium look.

halloween.name: Midnight Whisper
halloween.description: A deep charcoal teddy with subtle glowing accents, evoking the mystery of Halloween nights. A rare piece that blends elegance with a touch of spook.

halloween.name: Moonveil
halloween.description: A soft-toned doll inspired by the pale glow of a full moon. Minimal yet enchanting, designed for collectors who love refined seasonal rarities.

halloween.name: Shadow Ember
halloween.description: A premium teddy in dusky tones with ember-like highlights, symbolizing the flicker of Halloween lanterns. Exclusive, hauntingly beautiful.

halloween.name: Eclipse Charm
halloween.description: A doll with dark elegance, accented by subtle metallic finishes. Represents the rare magic of an eclipse — a true centerpiece collectible.

newyear.name: Luminara
newyear.description: A radiant teddy that embodies the brilliance of fireworks and the spirit of new beginnings. A glowing collectible to welcome the year in style.

newyear.name: Aurelia
newyear.description: A doll with golden finishes, crafted to symbolize prosperity and celebration. Refined and timeless, made for collectors of elegance.

newyear.name: Vespera
newyear.description: A deep-toned teddy with sleek accents, inspired by midnight countdowns and sparkling skies. A limited piece that defines festive luxury.

newyear.name: Eterna Nova
newyear.description: A premium doll representing renewal and everlasting charm. Designed as a collector’s jewel to mark the transition into a brighter future.
